attributes.action: speed humps along middleton road banbury oxfordshire
attributes.additional_details: their are people with sleeping problems along this road and when they race along this road early hours of the morning its not fair as like myself i have insomnia and can only have 20 mins to an hours sleep and once i've been woken up thats me done for the rest of the night and it takes me ages to get to sleep
attributes.background: make sure their is an allowance for speed humps along this road

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the local council.

You can find out about petitioning them here: http://modgov.cherwell.gov.uk/documents/s8564/Cherwell%20District%20Council%20Petitions%20Scheme.pdf

You could also raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
